name: Reversal (ZzaXiaotian)
description:
Reversal is a 2D puzzle game set in a mysterious, hierarchical tower. Over the course of the game, the player will use reversal-related abilities obtained along the way, such as gravity reversal, to solve puzzles and climb to the top floor of the tower.

With innovative puzzle design and an emotional, heartbreaking story told without words, Reversal aims to raise awareness of and express the desire to minimize the gaps between the real world hierarchies.
